attributes.title: spooky 😿
attributes.review: when i first opened the app i saw a scary fnaf jump scare and it scared me so bad i did a diarrhea 🙀😣. I’ve been kicked out of the house and i’m living in the dumpster with my rat buddies where we commit arson 𝓭𝓪𝓲𝓵𝔂 ✨🙈 🧚. Cheeto man haunts my dreams every night to the point where i hallucinate cheeto man joining my rat buddies and beating my siblings to a pulp. I Don’t recommend this app.

attributes.title: Ruined my phones aesthetic
attributes.review: Not to happy with the lay out hard to understand and load, ruined the aesthetic of my phone and greatly unbalanced my home screen. Had to build a wall between this app and my others cause it simply wasn’t born with my phone, like all my apps that I have.

attributes.title: This app is as dysfunctional as our economy
attributes.review: Upon downloading I wasn’t even able to load anything or get any support from the support team. It is a true representation of our government, people can’t get support either. Maybe trump should take less golf trips and spend more on his app!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: this app is completely terrible like first of all it asked me for my number #weird😟 then after that when I opened the app I saw OLD WHITE MEN 🤮 having sex with each other and it said “ we love to ride each other’s dicks” as the caption I don’t know what wig wearing, happiness snatching, child molesting ,spray tanned devil made this app but it’s not ok 🖕🏽🙅🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: bad app!
attributes.review: this app is absolutely terrible. i strongly recommend you to not download it. it caused me to have a seizure due to seeing an orange man as soon as i opened the app. it was dark in my room and the last thing i wanna see is a bright, fat, wide, and orange man. but that’s unfortunately what i saw :(. it was horrifying. i could not sleep after that. and was soon rushed to the hospital. i believe that counts as some type of murder ❤️🧚🏼‍♀️✨ idkidk. but, delete this app. not to mention, some unpleasing photos of this man are found on twitter. this is extremely inappropriate for viewers.

attributes.title: no bueno
attributes.review:
opened the app and was terrified. little bunker boy cheeto was just there. like who in their right mind wants to see that. i almost cried. in fact i felt a piece of my soul, yeah my soul, chip away! 

truly disturbed to see this on an app where i was trying to broaden my political knowledge. this is a shame to anything political or knowledgeable. should be deleted 

the hatred towards women, minorities, and immigrants (even though his wife is and immigrant) is astonishing. i see a man who thinks saying “if i close my eyes i do not see” to corona testing and continues to use racist slurs towards the corona virus and it’s origins. 

if this shame of a man continues to be our president i am in fear that my rights will be stripped away as a women and as someone part of gen z. 

bunker boy be aware. gen z will not let you silence us. be careful with your actions. we are powerful. we are strong. we are determined. be scared.

attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: This app is soooo glitchy. Every time I tried to open it, my screen would go black and takes me to my homepage. Until finally I was able to get on and it kept lagging. Don’t recommend 😞. I feel so disappointed that he is unable to make an app

attributes.title: I HAVE BEEN VIOLATED
attributes.review: I CANT BELIEVE THIS HAPPENED TO ME. i opened the app and the FIRST thing i saw was a ORANGE PIG🤮🐖 it just kept oinking and oink and then IT THREW UP EVERYWHERE. 🤯🤬 i have SERIOUS HEALTH PROBLEMS and these graphic and gruesome images could have KILLED ME. 😵🤢AND IT GETS WORSE! as soon as i allowed notifications i got sent pictures of a HUGE CHEETO MAN HOLDING HIS TINY “SAUSAGE”. it was disgusting 🤧🙀 it was shriveled up and barely an inch long.💩🤬😭i feel REVOLTED 😣😖

attributes.title: Horrific app
attributes.review: It is not only wrong but unethical to allow an app like this one on the App Store. First, it crashes repeatedly and slows down your phone to a snails pace. Second, the app promotes a racist, misogynist, homophobic, sociopathic narcissist who has no regard for human life and disrespects any culture that isn’t white. Third, stop the brainwashing of the uneducated please and thank you.

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: this app is just a no❤️i came to learn about cheeto man and his “Trump2020” campaign but turns out this app is just terrible, it’s slow and it sent out unnecessary and random alerts and notifications that i didn’t sign up for. make a better app pls! i will never download this again, have a great day💝💋🦄🥰🧚‍♀️🤩😘💜✨
